directions: Stir together mayonnaise, chives, and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Spread 4 slices of toast with some of mayonnaise and top with half of egg, tomato, bacon, and herbs. Spread both sides of 4 more slices of toast with mayonnaise and place on top. Cover with remaining egg, tomato, bacon, herbs, and toast (spread with mayonnaise). Secure sandwiches with picks and cut as desired.
ingredients: 4 hard-boiled eggs, thinly sliced and seasoned with salt
1 pound sliced bacon, halved and cooked until crisp
2 cups loosely packed mixed herb leaves such as flat-leaf parsley, cilantro, and basil
title: Bacon, Egg, and Tomato Club Sandwiches
